data.eml:eml: A new Rhagovelia in the armata group from Colombia (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Veliidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Padilla-Gil, Dora N. (2011): A new Rhagovelia in the armata group from Colombia (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Veliidae). Zootaxa 2784: 33-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207357
